name: Bombs Away (andosolator)
description:
Fully funded by the FBI. Bombing the unsuspecting citizens of the infidels town has never been so much fun. The big question is who’s actually paying these people to die? Will we ever find out. Another Ludum Dare Game by MrWillowB Andrew Willoughby 2019.

Created in under 48 hours using: Unity 2019. Adobe Flash. Audacity/Pulseboy.
